name: The Setlist Generator
description: A website consisting of a Javascript (React) frontend and Node backend for generating setlists for Spotify artists based on song popularity. Outdated code.

name: The WebSocket IRC Mimic
description: An IRC-like experience in the browser by using WebSockets.

name: The YouTube Audio Player
description: A YouTube audio-only player consisting of a Javascript frontend and Node.js backend.

name: The Voice Memo Repository
description: A service consisting of a Javascript (React) frontend and Node backend for quickly and easily recording, storing, removing, and sharing short audio recordings made natively in the browser.

name: The Obsolete OS Keygen
description: An old-school key generator for outdated operating systems made in Javascript.

name: The List Picking Thing
description: A simple decision-making tool written in Javascript for picking elements from a list.

name: The Stream Detector
description: A Firefox addon that detects streams and assembles readymade commands for capturing.

name: Ecce Arca
description: A website made in Javascript (React) and Node for rating the thousands of audio files contained in Rivers Cuomo's Dropbox.
